document.full_text: robin williams made either a risky, or courageous, choice for his broadway acting debut by depicting the ghost of a bengal tiger slinking around the bloody streets of baghdad trying to make sense of humans and war.
document.title: robin williams haunts broadway in "bengal tiger"
lines_and_colors: robin williams made either a risky, or courageous, choice for his broadway acting debut by depicting the ghost of a bengal tiger slinking around the bloody streets of baghdad trying to make sense of humans and war.
